dt: {bc}an insurance agent who investigates personal or property damage and makes estimates for effecting settlements

shortdef: one that adjusts; especially : an insurance agent who investigates personal or property damage and makes estimates for effecting settlements

dt: {bc}a person who works for an insurance company and whose job is to decide how much money the company will pay people when they are injured or when their property is damaged, lost, or stolen

shortdef: a person who works for an insurance company and whose job is to decide how much money the company will pay people when they are injured or when their property is damaged, lost, or stolen
